title: The Heartbreak Team; Jerry Jones talks; Best weekend matchup; Jason Cabinda; Alan Faneca
itunes:title: The Heartbreak Team; Jerry Jones talks; Best weekend matchup; Jason Cabinda; Alan Faneca
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and former Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew start the Thursday Night Football preview between the Pittsburgh Steelers and Minnesota Vikings by looking at the heartbreaks the Vikings have endured after they lost their 5th game this season on the final play against the Lions. Then they react to Jerry Jones' comments on the mistakes from Dallas Cowboys wide receivers; they share which weekend matchup they're most looking forward to viewing; they're joined by Detroit Lions fullback, Jason Cabinda, and he shares why it means so much to be a nominee for the Walter Payton Man of the Year award; and lastly, they're joined by Hall of Famer, Alan Faneca, and he shares memories of playing in the Super Bowl, his weight loss and marathon journey. and if LSU is on the right track with the hiring of Brian Kelly.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
